quote_last:
when I drove into our mews.”
“Now, then, be careful about this, Mountain. I want to know exactly what happened when you drove up to the house. Tell us in your own way.”
The coachman looked round amongst the listeners as if he were a little perplexed. “Why, sir,” he answered, turning back to Barthorpe, “there was nothing happened!”
title: The Herapath Property
author: J.S. Fletcher
